titleStmt.title: A treatise of God's government and of the justice of his present dispensations in this world by the pious, learned and most eloquent Salvian ... ; translated from the Latin by R.T. ... ; with a preface by the Reverend Mr. Wagstaffe.
De gubernatione Dei. English
titleStmt.author: Salvian, of Marseilles, ca. 400-ca. 480.
R. T., Presbyter of the Church of England.
Wagstaffe, Thomas, 1645-1712.

notesStmt.note: Advertisements on p. [23] and p. [1] at end.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
